q_ch: 我是Advanced Sewers，请将属于我的所有2024年5月1日-2024年5月30日之间开始的裁剪任务转给Premier Sewers。
q_en: I am an Advanced Sewer. Please transfer all cutting tasks that started between May 1, 2024, and May 30, 2024, to Premier Sewers.
thought: To transfer all cutting tasks that started between May 1, 2024, and May 30, 2024, to the working group 'Premier Sewers', we first need to identify the ID of the working group named 'Premier Sewers'. Then, we will update the working_group_id for the relevant cutting tasks to this ID.

sqls.command: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Premier Sewers'; UPDATE cutting_tasks SET working_group_id = (SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Premier Sewers') WHERE is_started = TRUE AND start_time BETWEEN '2024-05-01 00:00:00' AND '2024-05-30 23:59:59';
